casebody.data:
JAMES McWILLIAMS BLUE LINE, Inc., Appellant, v. THE Steam Tug N. Y. C. NO. 15, The New York Central Railroad Company, Appellee. No. 342. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 4, 1931. Leo J. Curren, of New York City, for appellant. *1079Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (C. W. Hagen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
